version_description:
* Improved search engine for a faster access to definitions
* Performance enhancements and bug fixes

* Performance improvements
* Bug fixes

* Optimized for iOS 9!
* Support for slide-over and split-view multitasking (for iPad models with multitasking support)

NEW! Invite friends - Share the app with your friends and let them know about this great reference tool!

* invite and share with friends;
* review 'Word of the day' entries;

* Voice Search - speak to enter your searches quicker (iOS 10 only), also includes Voice Search Shortcut for all devices with 3D touch technology
* Voice Over - hear the word definition of your entries (iOS 8, 9 & 10)

* Voice Search - speak to enter your searches quicker (iOS 10 only), also includes Voice Search Shortcut for all devices with 3D touch technology

• Complete visual redesign
• New Home view for quick access to the most frequently used functions
• New Talk & Translate feature introduced
• Now Swipe to delete entries from the Favorites and Recent menus
• Navigate the Word of the Day e

* Big fixes and improvements

•The dictionary entitles the newest version (2018 edition) of the audio database provided by Oxford University Press.
•The application could now be customized with any of the four new colorful themes.
•The updates within the Favorites/Recent list a

• Newest audio database version (2018 edition).
• Added four new colorful themes.
• Delete and sort entries with Favorites/Recent list.
• Keyboard matches the currently active language.
• Word-of-the-Day displays words from the selected lang
